answers.answer: Hello,fasting blood sugar of 125 is too high. Actually even 105 is higher than ideal.  Please discuss with your Dr. regarding your blood sugar levels as if your fasting is this high, your post eating numbers may be very much higher.  You may need medications already for diabetes (and may also be recommended to stop the roacootane).
thnx for your valueable post. now in this situation i want to go to dr and use tabs for control the blood sugar. do i have real chance to reconsile and have a normal life?

Hi.You could try lifestyle measures as well.  Such as cutting carbs (cut sugars, sweets, reduce limit grains, fruit, starchy veges), and vigorous exercise.However, given your age, normal weight, you already exercise, if cutting carbs is not enough you may also need medications.Please test your post eating blood sugar.  Test your blood sugar 1.5 - 2 hour after eating your regular meal.  The post eating number should ideally be < 120, and not more than 140.

question: I AM A 37 YEAR OLD MALR AND HAVE VERY AMOUNT AOF ACNE ONLY ON MY HEAD SINCE ABOUT 17 YEARS. I USE VERY VERY LARGE AMOUNT OF DRUSG IN THIS YEARS BUT BECAUSE OF STRENGTH OF MESSILIUM AND ARTROSCOPE(THE REASON OF ACNE ON MY HEAD) DO NOT HAVE SPECIAL RESULT. ABOUT 3O DAYS AGO MY DR PRESCRIBE ME ROACOOTANE TAB. I AM 182 CM HIGH AND 80 KG WEIGH AND EXERCISE EVERY DAY BUT HAVE THE POTENTIAL OF DIABETBE CAUSE OF FAMILIY GEN. MY FBS BEFORE START ROACOOTANE WAS 105 AND NOW IS 125. I USE THIE DRUG EVERY OTHER DAY. IS THIS GETTING HIGH FBS  WOULD BE RESULT OF THIS TABLET. AT LAST I SHOULD SAY MY SKIN IS VERY VERY OILY AND AFTER START ROACOOTANE MY ACNE AND SKIN OIL REDUCE
title: roacootane tablet
